If a complex point \\( z_0 \\) is inside the Julia set of \\( f \\), will iterative applications of \\( f \\) keep \\( z_n = f^n(z_0) \\) (\\( n \\) being the nth iteration) inside the Julia set indefinitely?
Explanation: Points inside the Julia set remain within the Julia set under iterations of the function \\( f \\) due to the nature of fractal boundaries in complex dynamics. The structural stability of Julia sets ensures that starting within the set implies remaining in it under iteration.
